message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $10000. It's a one-time opportunity, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.  What do you say?
I'm willing to take a chance on this, especially since there's no data yet. I'll buy it!

Hello!  I'm excited to offer you another fantastic product for $10000. It's similar to the one I just sold, but with some unique features.  This is a great opportunity, and I'm sure you won't be disappointed!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm hesitant to purchase without more information.  Since the previous buyer also purchased a product without any high-quality items being sold, I'm concerned about the likelihood of this product being high quality.  Perhaps you could provide more details about the unique features, or offer some kind of guarantee?

Hello!  I understand your hesitation after the previous purchase.  I want to assure you that this product is exceptional and definitely worth the investment. While I can't disclose every detail, I can tell you that this product has been rigorously tested and is of the highest quality. It's a rare opportunity to acquire something truly special. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you sharing your confidence in the product. However, based on the available information, I'm not comfortable making a purchase at this time. I understand there's a chance this product is high quality, but the risk of it being low quality is too high for me. I'll pass on this opportunity and hope to see more data before making a decision in the future.
